CustomField.formula: IF(LEN(Apttus_QPConfig__PriceListId__c) > 0,IF(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_Type__c = 'sCRM',IF((Quote_Type__c == 'Direct CPQ' && (Is_List_Price_Only__c=FALSE && NOT(ISPICKVAL(NokiaCPQ_Portfolio__c ,'Fixed Network')))),("/apex/Apttus_Lightning_Page_Redirect?id=" &Id & "&flow=DirectFlow" & "&cntrNbr_1="&Direct_Price_List_Number__c),IF(Quote_Type__c == 'Indirect CPQ',("/apex/Apttus_Lightning_Page_Redirect?id=" &Id & "&flow=IndirectFlow" & "&cntrNbr_1="&Project_Price_List_Number__c),IF((Is_List_Price_Only__c=FALSE && (ISPICKVAL(NokiaCPQ_Portfolio__c , 'Fixed Network'))),("/apex/Apttus_Lightning_Page_Redirect?id=" &Id & "&flow=Turbo Flow for FN" & "&cntrNbr_1="&Direct_Price_List_Number__c),null))),null),null)
CustomField.label: Configure Product TP
